title: All about ships
creator_credit: South Australia. Dept. of Education and George Klein
brief_description: An animated film depicting the evolution of ships from the log raft to the development of the nuclear powered vessel. This story of ships includes the early problems of navigation and ship building and portrays human endeavours to improve sea transport in all parts of the world.
creator_credit_for_label: South Australia. Dept. of Education and George Klein
